page.title: 03SECONDARY SCHOOLS
page.content: SECONDARY SCHOOL AGE CHILDREN MAINLY ATTEND THE WILLIAM DE FERRERS SCHOOL WHICH IS PART OF A COMMUNITY CENTRE, HOUSING,POLICE,YOUTH CENTRE,LIBRARY,SCHOOL PSYCHOLOGICAL SERVICE,ADULT EDUCATION,SPORTS CENTRE,PARISH COUNCIL OFFICE,THEATRE AND COMMUNITY BAR. CENTRE OPENED IN 1982 BUT OFFICIALLY OPENED IN 1983 BY SIR KEITH JOSEPH, EDUCATION MINISTER. HULLBRIDGE CHILDREN MAINLY ATTEND PARK COMPREHENSIVE SCHOOL OR SWEYNE COMPREHENSIVE IN NEARBY RAYLEIGH. WILLIAM DE FERRERS SCHOOL ROLL 1984,630PUPILS.ESTIMATED PEAK IS 1400 INCLUDING SIXTH FORM BY 1988. THE SCHOOL IS BEING BUILT IN PHASES.BEFORE SCHOOL OPENED, THE HEADMASTER APPOINTED STAFF IN HIS OFFICE AT COLLINGWOOD SCHOOL.
